CustomField.description: Measurement rating of the risk associated with a particular transaction, based on the potential E&S risks identified. Sourced from completion of the TRA (transaction risk assessment) in the E&S screening tool.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Measurement rating of the risk associated with a particular transaction, based on the potential E&S risks identified. Sourced from completion of the TRA (transaction risk assessment) in the E&S screening tool.
CustomField.label: Transaction Risk
